code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[userId,setUserId]=useState('');const[recommendations,setRecommendations]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();setLoading(true);try{const response=await axios.post('https://recommendation-model-3.onrender.com/recommend',{user_id:parseInt(userId),num_recommendations:5});setRecommendations(response.data.recommendations);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching recommendations',error);}setLoading(false);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",style:{padding:'20px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"UberEats Restaurant Recommendations"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",placeholder:"Enter User ID",value:userId,onChange:e=>setUserId(e.target.value),required:true,style:{padding:'8px',marginRight:'10px'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",style:{padding:'8px 16px'},children:"Get Recommendations"})]}),loading&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading..."}),recommendations.length>0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{marginTop:'20px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Recommended Restaurants:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:recommendations.map(rec=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[rec.name," (",rec.cuisine,") - Rating: ",rec.rating," - Delivery: ",rec.delivery_time," mins"]},rec.restaurant_id))})]})]});}export default App;
